title: Tikeri Managed Nature Reserve
about: Tikeri Managed Nature Reserve is a protected area in Adjara, Kobuleti Municipality. It is characterized by a diversity of flora and fauna. The reserve area is perfect for picnics or small trips. Tikeri relict Colchian forest creates marvelous scenery. Tikeri Managed Nature Reserve is bordered on the south by the protected areas of Ispani. If you want to relax and unwind in the tranquility of nature this is definitely one of the most attractive places. Tikeri Nursery operates near Tikeri Managed Nature Reserve.
